name: Restaurant Flipper
description:
Restore abandoned places to surpass their former glory. You buy neglected bars and restaurants to fix mistakes of their former owners. Give them new life with your vision and attract more customers than ever. Create your fortune with efficient renovations and great deals to one day be owner of self-designed 5-star gourmet heaven mentioned in every guide.



Some premises are so ruined that they look like a horror movie setting. Enjoy freedom of destruction to get rid of the old. Break walls as you please and build new ones, but be wary of the budget. Change the scenery beyond recognition with selection of different materials. Buy and place everything from pizza oven, through tables, to pinball machines.



You can enforce a certain style or create your own mix. Use efficient presets or design every detail by yourself. Make best use of available space and bring out unique advantages each place possess. Be sure to fulfill requirements of customers and make them comfortable with climate control, music and additional attractions. Every decision matters.



Your finished work will be tested and judged by both customers and critics, but star rating is not everything. You need to create an attractive deal so the next owners can hope to enjoy prosperity while you take on another challenge.
